entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:44 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 10:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

Temperature: -36.7°C

Visibility: 9.7 km

Dewpoint: -41.1°C

entry.title: Monday: Partly cloudy. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
